main event: A private pilot reported seeing 3 bright circular lights giving brief flashes of light as they moved at high speed in a straight line across the sky from east to west.
interesting points: The lights were circular in shape and emitted no sound,The sighting occurred on 26/03/52 at 2635Z,The pilot is considered a reliable witness,The lights were reported to move quickly,The objects were visible for approximately 10 minutes.
